# HT's Comprehend Measures

![Dynamic JSON Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fhalftonex%2Fhts-comprehend-measures%2Freleases%2Flatest%2Fdownload%2Fmodule.json&query=compatibility.verified&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BDQo8L3N2Zz4%3D&logoColor=yellow&label=Foundry%20Version&color=orange)
![Dynamic JSON Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fhalftonex%2Fhts-comprehend-measures%2Freleases%2Flatest%2Fdownload%2Fmodule.json&query=relationships.systems%5B0%5D.compatibility.verified&logo=dungeonsanddragons&logoColor=crimson&label=D%26D5e%20Version&color=crimson)
![Dynamic JSON Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?url=https%3A%2F%2Fforge-vtt.com%2Fapi%2Fbazaar%2Fpackage%2Fhts-comprehend-measures&query=package.installs&suffix=%25&logo=condaforge&logoColor=green&label=Forge%20Installs&color=green)
![GitHub release (latest by SemVer including pre-releases)](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/halftonex/hts-comprehend-measures/latest/total?logo=github&logoColor=teal&label=Downloads%20Latest&color=teal)

HT's Comprehend Measures converts all measurements in D&D 5E content to your preferred units. It provides automatic conversions on import and creation, as well as manual controls.

### Features

- Automatic conversion for Actor, Item, and Scene documents.
- Header controls and context menu options for manual conversions.
- Optional world startup conversion for bulk updates.

## Support

For any issues, requests and bug reporting, you can dm me on discord @half.tone or visit the project's Github issue page [here](https://github.com/halftonex/hts-comprehend-measures/issues).
